comprehensive_overview: fastq-tools is a collection of simple and efficient command-line tools for processing FASTQ files commonly used in bioinformatics. It provides various utilities for quality control, filtering, and manipulation of raw sequencing data in FASTQ format.
core_features: Some of the core features of fastq-tools include quality assessment, adapter trimming, filtering by quality scores, file format conversion, and extraction of specific sequences from FASTQ files. It aims to streamline common preprocessing tasks in next-generation sequencing data analysis pipelines.
